data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy Grand Prime SM-G531F, Android 5.1.1
data.actual_result: Client automatically reconnects to this VC, but mic is muted/unmuted
data.short_description: Automatically reconnects to VC after pressing mute microphone and instantly pressing leave voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Join VC - Press mute or unmute mic button - Instantly press leave VC button
